This app demonstrates several key features of `page_opts()`:

1. `title`: Sets the page title shown in the app
2. `window_title`: Sets the browser window/tab title
3. `lang`: Sets the language (in this case, English)
4. `fillable`: Makes the page content fillable

The app provides:
- A sidebar with region and product selection dropdowns
- A bar plot showing sales for the selected region and product
- A table displaying detailed sales information
- Synthetic data generated on-the-fly

When you run this app, you'll see:
- The browser tab will show "Company Sales Analytics"
- The app title will be "Sales Dashboard"
- Users can interactively select regions and products
- The plot and table will update dynamically based on selections

Key Shiny for Python express mode features used:
- `ui.page_opts()`
- `ui.sidebar()`
- `ui.layout_columns()`
- `@render.plot`
- `@render.table`
- Reactive inputs and outputs
